channel.title: analytics on After Dark
channel.description: Recent content in analytics on After Dark

item.title: Module System
item.description: After Dark uses Theme Components and Fetch Injection to provide a plug-in system for enhancing site functionality using optional add-on modules. View the list of available modules.
item.content:encoded: After Dark uses Theme Components and Fetch Injection to provide a plug-in system for enhancing site functionality using optional add-on modules. View the list of available modules.

item.title: Voyeur
item.content:encoded: Fathom Mirror: codeberg.org/vhs/mirrors/fathom Module Source: codeberg.org/vhs/voyeur Voyeur Analytics Dashboard. Please visit the Fathom Website for interactive product demo. Installation Choose module download source: www.npmjs.com/package/mod-voyeur www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/mod-voyeur codeberg.org/vhs/voyeur Extract module contents into site themes directory: ├── static └── themes ├── after-dark └── voyeur Specify module in site config: 6# Controls default theme and theme components 7theme = [ 8 &#34;voyeur&#34;, # sequence before &#34;after-dark&#34; 9 &#34;after-dark&#34; 10] See README.md to confirm you&rsquo;re using the minimum required version of After Dark; and module setup, configuration and usage instructions. If you need help you may Submit an Issue with your question.
